preqs: One of (BND1002, BMS1042, HSC2141, NUT1002, PHH2141).

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BMS1042, HSC2141, NUT1002, PHH2141}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BMS1042, HSC2141, NUT1002, PHH2141}

unitName: Environmental determinants of health and disease
description: This unit explores the role of environmental factors in human health, how environmental health hazards are identified and how the risks can be assessed and managed. This unit will cover chemical, biological and physical hazards and their potential health effects in a range of environmental contexts. This unit will encourage students to critically evaluate environmental health information and its application in realistic situations. In this unit students will explore practical examples of environmental health hazards to identify the human health risks present, ways to assess exposure and options and strategies for assessment and management of the health risks identified.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
